title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Effective Teaching Method Design for Pandemic Situations: Deliberate Practice and Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more motivation strategies through intentional learning design in pandemic situations
Learners can design language instruction scenarios using feedback-based teaching methods in VR simulations
Learners can integrate classroom management strategies when designing activities in the information transmission-processing-practice-transfer phases
Learners can propose home-learning linkage plans considering parental support systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
